website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice for customers wanting an easy-to-use adjustable garden rake.
pros: The ideal tool for hand gardening
Durable metal tines can adjust 10 to 12 inches in length and 3 to 6 inches in width
Bright orange color makes rake easy to find
cons: A few buyers complained of the product being flimsy
A little too expensive for some

customer_reviews.title: Extremely usefull, take it from a professional landscaper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rake! I work as a landscaper/garden maintenance person and this rake is way better than any other handrake I've ever used (and I've used them all!) Small enough to stick in a back pocket and whip out to clean out shrubs or expand it to use as a 'big hand" to pick up debree quickly, or make it narrow to reach into shrubs to clean out old leaves and debree. Added bonus is that the handle is red for quick location in keeping track of tools. Just love this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little hand rake
customer_reviews.text: This tool is surprisingly strong! I am using it to rake out the old decorative gravel along my driveway so I can edge the darn drive without hitting hard little rocks all the time. It is awesome, and will lift the stones right out. Looks like new even though this is a brutal job! Would recommend to any home gardner or landscaper!
customer_reviews.author: Paula W.

customer_reviews.title: I am glad it is still available
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one of these Hand Rakes for 30 years, and it is still being used. I ordered this one for a spare. The tines have changed from a round wire tine to this flat wire tine, but overall it still look the same. I am glad it is still available, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carve&Glass

customer_reviews.title: I you're a gardener, you owe it to yourself to have one!
customer_reviews.text: This rake is positively perfect for cleaning debris out of smallish, hard to reach places among plants. Every year it is the single most used of the several hand garden tools I own. I bought it years ago at a local garden store, then never saw it for sale again until I found it on Amazon a couple weeks ago - and bought four, one for me just i case I should lose my old one, and three as gifts for gardening friends. It's pricey, but it is not overpriced for what it does and how well it does it.
customer_reviews.author: DICK DICKERSON

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a decent, small, hand-held steel rake to be able to use to break up hard dirt surface. While this is very lightweight, it will be unable to do the job as it is very flimsy. It is probably very good for sifting thru a garden or something where the ground isnt so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Love the Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of hand raking, particularly in my flower beds, and sometimes I have narrow spaces to work with. This adjustable rake gives me the flexibility I need. I wish the tines were shaped a little differently at the end, but I'm glad I bought the product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for combing ornamental grasses
customer_reviews.text: Although the rake has many uses (raking between shrubs, etc. ), I use it to comb my cool-season ornamental grasses (blue oat grass, mexican feather grass, pink muhly grass), to remove the dead leaves without damaging the green ones. Works great, like a comb for unruly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul J

customer_reviews.title: Handy little hand rake!
customer_reviews.text: Works are expected. I love how you can extend the rake tines. Makes it easier to store and good for lots of gardening applications. What I use it for mostly is to rake the dead leaves in my flower beds from between and underneath the shrubs.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DJ

customer_reviews.title: Tines too thin and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Not enough resistance by the tines to do any good. Fragile construction. Maybe good to scrape flaked paint or something
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handy hand-held rake
customer_reviews.text: I had a rake similar to this and used it for many years, mostly for thatching small areas of grass. I bought this to replace my old one. The tines are stong and sturdy and get the job done. I love the ability to adjust the width.
customer_reviews.author: Patti M.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, Light Weight, Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the way this little rake can get into the nooks and crannies to rake out leaves. It is light weight and the ability to adjust the length is a neat feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool
customer_reviews.text: Just what you need to get in those corners and delicate flower beds. Because it is adjustable no area is too small
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while you find a garden tool that really is great. This is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoDan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these rakes for many years. After a few of the tines broke, I could not find a rake that works as well as this. I was glad to find this again!
customer_reviews.author: OMH50

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flexibility the sliding size button provides. Arrived very fast too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ktaylor

customer_reviews.title: Handy garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these rakes years ago and it was fantastic. The design of the tines seems a little different (improved) and I’m sure it will hold up as well as my last one did. This is a great little rake to add to your garden toolbox!
customer_reviews.author: Hezra

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that this hand take stays firm even when extended. Makes it easy to get leaves out the bark and mulch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars because it was exactly what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because it was exactly what I was looking for, for my square foot garden. It's well constructed and the tines are stiff enough to till the medium without being wimpy and bending under use.
customer_reviews.author: Norman B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this hand rake
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand rake. I had one years ago and was happy to find it again. Perfect for flower gardens.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in Arcade NY

customer_reviews.title: this addition is great very handy and useful thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have a lawn service and spend a lot of time on my knees and in bushes and schrubs cleaning them out, i own a rake for just about any job, this addition is great very handy and useful thank you scott
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up on looks!
customer_reviews.text: Broke foot so not in garden atm! Lol. Looks like a good tool!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: The price is too high but otherwise I like
customer_reviews.text: Use to have several rakes similar to this for $5. I had to modify this one to do the job I wanted it to do. Cut off an inch and re-bent the tines the other way to make it sturdier. Can now use for raking and scraping up tough soil. The price is too high but otherwise I like it
customer_reviews.author: denise fandrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good design, good workmanship; happy to have this tool in my arsenal..
customer_reviews.author: M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little rake. It is my favorite new garden tool. It is flexible, but very durable for raking out around my flowers and shrubs.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it can be adjusted to different lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bonanducci

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this to rake my zen garden and works well.
customer_reviews.author: AJ “Taking Actions”

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Rake !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand rake, just what I needed !! It is very nice quality and arrived very quickly. Thank You !!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this rake years ago. So much easier to do little projects in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Constance L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Favorite garden tool
customer_reviews.text: My most used garden tool! Had one and lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It is rather flimsy. I have another one that I use but it is not adjustable so I thought I would try this one. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia A

customer_reviews.title: A handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is adjustable. That is the most important feature for me, and why I purchased this one above all the other hand rakes I considered.
customer_reviews.author: Susabella

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this great hand rake she uses in the garden. I had never heard of it before. I've had mine for about a month now. What a great tool for getting under my lavender and gaura plants to clear out weeds and debris! It seems strong and durable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: MB HANA Small Garden Hand Rake - Adjustable Steel Shrub Rake
product_meta.description:
MB HANA’s small garden rake is a perfect gift for gardeners who want to keep their gardens looking good. When you need to rake around plants in hard-to-reach or confined spaces, it adjusts to the right size for the task. This handy rake sure beats using your fingers with prickly debris or in a flower bed favored by pets. Use it to clear leaves under rose bushes or other thorny shrubs and to protect your hands from being scratched. 

It is comfortable to use when seated or gardening on your knees. There is no long, awkward handle and you can store it in a small space. 

4 Locking Positions 

The tines of MB HANA’s adjustable hand rake adjust to four locking positions. Push the button on the handle with your thumb to easily slide the tines to just the right length. You can change the spread of the sturdy metal tines from 3-6 inches. The overall length of the rake adjusts from 10-12 inches. 

Japanese Tool Quality 

Made in Japan for MB HANA. This rake with its tried and true design has been in production for over 30 years. Availability is limited in the United States. 

Order now for yourself and as a gift for your favorite gardener.
feature_bullets: When gardening on your hands and knees, use this handy rake in narrow spaces to sweep leaves
Perfect to clean gutters, spread mulch, and clear hedge trimmings – Easy to find in garden bed
Metal tines adjust to 4 positions (width 3 - 6 inches) to rake between and around shrubs
Expandable length (10 - 12 inches) to easily reach behind plants, with your right or left hand
GREAT GIFT - Portable rake makes clean up a snap for gardening, camping, or landscaping

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
